entry.title: Mirai-Webhook-Bridge Docs
entry.content:
API

接收消息

[ws] /receiveMessage

请求

无

相应

{    "code":0,                                       // 状态码    "errMsg":"",                                    // 错误信息    "sender":{                                      // 发送者信息        "fromGroup":{                                           "id":10000,                             // 群号            "name":"xxx",                           // 群名称            "botPermission":"owner"                 // 机器人在群中的权限        },        "id":1234567890,                            // 发送者账号        "name":"hello",                             // 发送者昵称（群中显示群名片）        "permission":"admin"                        // 发送者权限    },    "messageChain":[                                // 消息链        {            "msgID":10000,                          // 消息id            "msgTime":22222,                        // 发送时间            "msg":[                {                    "type":"Plain",                 // 消息类型                    "text":"hello world",           // 消息内容                },                {                    "type":"picture",                    "sources":"https://example.com/"                }            ]        }    ]}

发送消息

[ws] /sendMessage
entry.summary:
API

接收消

entry.title: 中缀表达式的转换和计算
Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
